programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: This movie is about a corrupt detective and a father who is falsely charged with murder. The chase begins when the father clears himself of the false accusation and plots his revenge on the detective.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: The Prison
programme.desc: A former detective enters a prison as a convict in order to meet a man who is known as The King among the inmates so he can reveal the truth about his brother's death.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Okay! Madam

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep993994
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1795
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3571
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45744575
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep386
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep955956
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45744575
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2010
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3571
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2011
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Jiang Play(M) Ep5
programme.desc: We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her father’s MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lan’s MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the club’s and her honour.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Triad
programme.desc: This is a story about the Hong Kong Triads. Ting (William Chan). Cheung (Derek Tsang) and Dong (Edward Chui) are childhood friends who join a Triad together. After joining however, they discover that fame and fortune will ultimately break them apart as only one of them can become the leader of the gang.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled “2046” which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension…

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Challenge Of The Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler’s apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the ‘Flying Guillotine Squad’, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlord’s daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called “Five Poison Web”, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Diary Of A Lady-Killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An ex-con drifter develops an unlikely friendship with a wealthy Dallas art dealer.

programme.title: HERSTORY: Judge Judy (S23) Ep3
programme.desc: The Judge takes a woman’s allegations against her boss very seriously; she is shocked to discover the real story.

programme.title: HERSTORY: The Drew Barrymore Show (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Drew takes the show on the road to join Katy Perry on-site at her Las Vegas residency. Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Stolen Valor - Pride travels to Afghanistan after the lead suspect in a murder case is found with the Navy-issued jacket of an officer believed to have been killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: Young Adult
programme.desc: A divorced writer from the Midwest returns to her hometown to reconnect with an old flame, who's now married with a family.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

programme.title: Cardboard House
programme.desc: Homelessness in Singapore is easy to miss. But once the lights are dimmed and the bustle quietens, they live in plain sight. From family problems to financial issues, the pains of the homeless are complex – but that shouldn’t stop us from seeing them.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me
programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couple’s relationship is put to the test as they discover each other’s secrets.

programme.title: Men In the City
programme.desc: A Berlin gym is the stage for five men to play out their testosterone-filled pursuits of casual sex, camaraderie and contoured bodies. As they stumble from one misadventure to another, including wrestling a crocodile, they learn the meaning of true love.

programme.title: Girl in Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Young, Blonde & Dead
programme.desc: When the mutilated bodies of three girls are found, police affirm that a serial killer is on the loose. As part of investigations, Inspector Julia enters the world of the rich and mighty – where the killer might be closer to her than she’d ever imagine.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: The Lottery Seer
programme.desc: As one of the few literate people in his Indonesian village in the 1980s, 5 year old Herman aspires to be a famous reader. However, his rare ability in the village leaves him open to exploitation.

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford
programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: Wacky Heroes
programme.desc: Two penniless brothers embark on a strange mission to protect and give their younger sister a better future. Armed with nothing but masks, cameras and their wits, they set out to take down the neighbourhood criminals. Soon, fame and power comes knocking.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford
programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jérémie dreams of a life away from his family’s sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his father’s despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Cold Blood
programme.desc: Detectives Julia and Felix arrive at a small village to investigate a murder. As investigations pick up, the residents remain strangely uncooperative and the duo soon discover that the idyllic place harbours an unfathomable evil secret.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: Anna is 40 – a mother of three and an overtaxed teacher. Daily, she struggles to balance her commitments. When she learns of her husband’s infidelity, the manic pace of her life spirals to a crashing – and catastrophic – halt for all involved.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1
programme.desc: Paula’s fresh start in Vietnam is a disaster: Her passport is confiscated, the appointment for her job falls through, and she ends up in the hospital after her handbag is stolen. The revelation that she has a twin sister there turns her world upside down.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Mountain in the Beautiful Valley - The Reykjanes peninsula in Iceland hasn't seen any volcanic activity for over 1000 years, until now. For a whole year the fishing village of Grindavik is rocked by huge earthquakes. One fateful evening the sky glows red; a hill erupts with a deluge of lava. Fagradasfjall volcano is born; five months later, the volcano shows no sign of stopping.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan - Steve and the team head to remotest Kyrgyzstan in search of snow leopards - if the team can find evidence of the endangered big cat, they could protect the region.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809. The British drink a staggering 195 million mugs of tea and coffee every day, so Gregg is following production of one of the factory's best sellers, the Halo Heritage mug.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Frozen Worlds - From the Poles to the highest mountain peaks, there are surprising frozen worlds found on every continent - home to unique and remarkable animals.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Mountain in the Beautiful Valley - The Reykjanes peninsula in Iceland hasn't seen any volcanic activity for over 1000 years, until now. For a whole year the fishing village of Grindavik is rocked by huge earthquakes. One fateful evening the sky glows red; a hill erupts with a deluge of lava. Fagradasfjall volcano is born; five months later, the volcano shows no sign of stopping.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan - Steve and the team head to remotest Kyrgyzstan in search of snow leopards - if the team can find evidence of the endangered big cat, they could protect the region.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809. The British drink a staggering 195 million mugs of tea and coffee every day, so Gregg is following production of one of the factory's best sellers, the Halo Heritage mug.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose, discovers the iron ore mining history, shoots St John's time gun and samples both traditional food and a traditional kitchen party.

programme.title: Extreme Treks (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Bolivia - The Choro Trek - The El Choro Trail starts in the lowland jungles of western Bolivia and finishes on the vast Alti-plano plateau that covers much of the country. The journey tracks a historical trading route used by locals for centuries.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep5
programme.desc: Chairs - Gregg Wallace and the team look inside a furniture factory making chair, following it from carving wood to making the finish product.

programme.title: Cheetah Family & Me (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: We follow Savannah and her four cubs in the Tswalu Kalahari Reserve, and Chili and her five kittens in the Great Karoo Wilderness - as they navigate a harsh environment, dangerous wildlife and dwindling prey.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Simon travels from the vast white salt flats of Bolivia, through the world's greatest wetlands of Brazil's Pantanal and on to the forested heart of Paraguay.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Freeze - Alaskans seek out vital resources amid a deep freeze in the heart of Dark Winter, pushing through temperatures well below zero.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Borneo - Borneo is rich with diverse and strange wildlife, including a sea monster Robson is hunting - a monster that can disappear.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep6
programme.desc: Maltloaf - Gregg Wallace sees how maltloaf is produced on a mass-scale.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of Australia's most iconic creatures.

programme.title: Extreme Treks (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Jordan - The Wadi Rum Desert - With its mountains rising up out of the sand, any journey through the Wadi Rum will leave you feeling you've traveled to another world. Join Ryan as he explores Amman and makes the arduous trek through the unforgiving Wadi Rum Desert.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep2
programme.desc: Ireland - Ben ventures to the 'Emerald Isle' to visit Georg and Bettina, an elderly couple from Austria and Germany who made the Irish wilderness their home nearly 40 years ago.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Guatemala - Robson Green travels to Guatemala in Central America to fish for one of the fastest fish on planet Earth.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep7
programme.desc: Boots - Gregg Wallace visits a boot factory in Wollaston, Northamptonshire to follow the production of a pair of Dr. Martens, while Cherry Healey gets to grips with the machines that make shoelaces.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Borneo - A journey from Borneo's rich coral reefs, through lush jungles to its mountainous heart, revealing why this island is home to a greater variety of life than almost any other.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Britain (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: After a lifetime of travels that have taken her across the globe, Joanna Lumley is making her most personal journey yet, travelling from Essex to Whitby.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Gabon - Steve Backshall and his team travel to Gabon, to help the government to try and establish an area of land and home for wildlife as a UNESCO World Heritage site.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Ecuador - In the last episode of the series, Robson Green fishes for the voracious grouper fish off the coast of Ecuador.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Colors & Patterns Ep7
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1
programme.desc: Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons Ep1
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Strange Powers Ep2
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Tidal Forest of Africa Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Rebuilding an Empire Ep2
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwa’s mating game.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Ugly Ep10
programme.desc: Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons Ep1
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwa’s mating game.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Ugly Ep10
programme.desc: Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Tidal Forest of Africa Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Strange Powers Ep2
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwa’s mating game.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Power Ep9
programme.desc: Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Ugly Ep10
programme.desc: Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Ocean Oddballs Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into the lives of the ocean’s weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fish’s eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Anatomy Gone Wild Ep4
programme.desc: Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari Ep2
programme.desc: Take a look at one of Africa’s most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Animals Gone Wild Ep3
programme.desc: As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Loners Ep11
programme.desc: Sidle up to lone wolf alphas who’d rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galápagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals’ amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Chatty/Communicative Ep12
programme.desc: Connect with Earth’s most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely don’t take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters’ chilling screams; face angry fruit bats’ loud complaints; and explore orcas’ human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Loners Ep11

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Chatty/Communicative Ep12
programme.desc: Connect with Earth’s most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely don’t take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters’ chilling screams; face angry fruit bats’ loud complaints; and explore orcas’ human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - the Secret Life of Manta Rays Ep4
programme.desc: The remote islands of Raja Ampat in the Indonesian archipelago are home to a diversity of marine life, including the secretive giants of the ocean - manta rays. A team of researchers from Conservation International heads out on an expedition to learn more about the biology, population size and migration patterns of these astonishing animals to protect them from overfishing outside of marine-protected areas.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Amazon of the Seas Ep5
programme.desc: The Indonesian archipelago lies in the heart of the Coral Triangle, a region of the ocean recognized worldwide as the center of marine biodiversity. With the highest number of coral and fish species on earth, Indonesia has the richest reefs on the planet - but these reefs are under threat...

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: In the town of Looe, Rick learns about a time when the Cornish were taken as slaves by North African pirates. He joins one of the last fishing boats in St Mawes and uses the catch of lemon sole to make a warm, delicious salad. In Newlyn, he meets two entrepreneur chefs who cook mackerel to perfection.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep2
programme.desc: Clean Harbors - When Alan S. McKim, Chairman and CEO of Clean Harbors, tackles some dirty jobs to see if his company needs cleaning up, he's faced with the challenge of working in a confined space.

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Mel and Tom's Attic Rooms - Mel and Tom live in the oldest house in their North Somerset village of Wrington, and want to turn their attic room into a quirky B&B rental suite with a writers retreat theme.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep1
programme.desc: In south Manchester, can Colin and Adele overcome contractor issues, delays and financial ruin to finish the build of their eye-popping curved glass home?

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: It's veggie week. The cooks level up vegetarian junk food and create a menu of meat alternatives for a packed-out hub, including two Team GB medal winners.

programme.title: Simply Italian (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Ravioli in Uovo, Pappardelle, Beetroot Pasta, Tortelli - Michela heads to Italy to cook up ravioli, pappardelle, beetroot pasta and tortelli.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S5) Ep15
programme.desc: It's the final and from the 20 young bakers who entered the tent, only one can be crowned winner. The finalists prepare multiple bakes for a tea party, including inside-out biscuits and trophy cakes.

programme.desc: Clean Harbors - When Alan S. McKim, Chairman and CEO of Clean Harbors, tackles some dirty jobs to see if his company needs cleaning up, he's faced with the challenge of working in a confined space.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Rick Stein's 'journey without maps' takes him through France's eastern border regions of Alsace and Jura home to his favourite French dish, choucroute garni.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: The five remaining teams make the classic layered dessert millefeuille, master the art of illusion, and create a bird-themed pièce montée adorned with Paris-Brest.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep2
programme.desc: Kate and Rob replace their 1940s past-it prefab with a bespoke, modern, factory-built home using volumetric modular construction. But will it feel like the characterful home they dream of?

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep2

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: Melbourne (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Immigration has played a massive role in shaping the food scene of Melbourne. Rachel explores Melbourne's melting pot of authentic cuisines, wandering through the authentic Vietnamese areas, tracking down the popular suburban hot bed of all things Greek and learns how to create the famous tomato based Passata from an Italian Nona.

programme.desc: Bread Week - The remaining bakers have a lot to prove as they put their own twist on a classic Italian focaccia, make a Greek-inspired snack and create ambitious designs in milk bread.

programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged Ep57
programme.desc: Downshift - After springing a coolant leak Dozer overheats and must dip in the faroff restorative mineral baths and learn to keep his temper in check along the way

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep13
programme.desc: Olivia And Grandma's Visit - Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia Ep14
programme.desc: Olivia Is Invited To Dinner - Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep9
programme.desc: Horse Powered Dinkie - Farmer Green tells the cars about olden days, when the only transport was horse and cart. Maxi and Drifter say they would never be seen travelling that slow… or would they?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep10
programme.desc: Fb's Sleepover - FB is excited about his sleepover with the other cars in the workshop but when the night draws in he is unsure of his unfamiliar surroundings. Big Chris helps set him at his ease

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep38
programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finly’s music performance, Archibald’s unique sound leads to a hit record. But as the pressures of fame and success loom over the band, they struggle to recreate that "Archibald sound" and recapture lightning in a bottle. / When the Strutters need a family portrait, they meet a burnt out photographer named Randy. After accidentally wrecking his studio, Archibald decides he’s going to help Randy rekindle his passion for photography.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep60
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Herd Is - With academy life on the horizon, the PALs work together to tame wild yearling Governor before they leave. But maybe he's not meant to be broken.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep5
programme.desc: It's a Wonderful LARP / My Sectional Romance - Audrey’s obsession with fun gets her too wrapped up in the Bloogey Boys’ LARPing game. The Harvey Girls and Bloogey Boys battle over who’s the rightful owner of a cool couch.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.desc: Chilling Out in Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.desc: We Love Nature - Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.desc: The Kite - While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep101

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
